radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Lateral radiograph of the right ankle
radiographic_examinations.findings: Well-defined elongated soft-tissue mass posterior to the distal tibia and calcaneus in the region of the Achilles tendon.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Sagittal T1-weighted MR images of the ankle
radiographic_examinations.findings: Fusiform enlargement of the Achilles tendon, isointense to muscle.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Axial proton density MR images of the ankle
radiographic_examinations.findings: Convex anterior border of Achilles tendon with low-signal-intensity tendon bundles interspersed within.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Axial T2-weighted MR images of the brain
radiographic_examinations.findings: Cerebral and cerebellar atrophy; bilateral symmetric periventricular white matter T2 hyperintensity; abnormal T2 hyperintensity in the dentate nucleus and surrounding deep cerebellar white matter.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: More advanced than expected for a 60-year-old patient.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hypointensity in both dentate nuclei and surrounding deep cerebellar white matter.
Hypointensity of the deep cerebellar white matter.
Increased diffusivity of the deep cerebellar white matter.
